H0.text: Which German word meaning 'armour' was applied to certain army divisions in World War II . Panzer

H1.text: Which German word meaning 'armour' was applied to certain army divisions in World War II . Schutz

H3.text: Which German word meaning 'armour' was applied to certain army divisions in World War II . Pzkw

A4.text: A panzer division was one of the armored (tank) divisions in the army of Nazi Germany during World War II.

A5.text: Panzer divisions were the key element of German success in the blitzkrieg operations of the early years of World War II.
